entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:48 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
